sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_176383_star_wars_gear"> <x_176383_star_wars_gear action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <base_damage>0</base_damage> <critical_rating/> <defense/> <description>Slings are lengths of hide or synthetic fabric designed to allow easy handling of long arms like blaster rifles and slugthrower rifles. They come in a dizzying array of styles, from the simple adjustable single-strap sling for carrying a weapon off the shoulder to multi-strap slings made of specialized materials that allow for any number of custom sling configurations. These attachments can only be used with Ranged (Heavy) weapons. Models Include: Custom-tooled Bantha hide sling, Tactical three-point sling, Quick-release one-point drop sling. Base Modifiers: Decrease Cumbersome rating by 1. Modification Options: 1 Innate Talent (Quick Draw) Mod.</description> <encumbrance/> <hard_points/> <hp_required>1</hp_required> <name>Weapon Sling</name> <number>GEAR0001157</number> <price>100</price> <range/> <rarity>0</rarity> <skill_used/> <soak/> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-11-19 04:39:08</sys_created_on> <sys_id>550b37f52fa42c90e0f497eef699b6b8</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-11-19 04:39:08</sys_updated_on> <type>mod</type> </x_176383_star_wars_gear> </record_update>
